tool_description:
HLS Video Transcoder, creates chunks, playlist, thumbs with detailed metadata of each file. And directly upload / send to your Amazon AWS S3 Bucket without any other call. It is super easy. 

It can convert, transcode && compress video files like *.mov, *.mp4 format with the best compression quality for mobile to HLS video.  

HLS video is a set of video chunks a with playlist file. You can publish your videos like on your site like YouTube, Netflix, etc... It is same technology. 

The conver...

title: C5- Transcode HLS Video & Upload Your Amazon AWS S3 Bucket

api_list.name: C5- Transcode HLS Video & Upload Your Amazon AWS S3 Bucket
api_list.description:
you must have AWS IAM user credentials with "putObject"
if you don't have, then check our A5 api, it returns temporary download link.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://c5-transcode-hls-video-upload-your-amazon-aws-s3-bucket.p.rapidapi.com/apifsp/transcoder/upload-to-aws-s3/video-hls"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "c5-transcode-hls-video-upload-your-amazon-aws-s3-bucket.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://c5-transcode-hls-video-upload-your-amazon-aws-s3-bucket.p.rapidapi.com/apifsp/transcoder/upload-to-aws-s3/video-hls"

print(response.json())
